title: User-Centric Privacy Controls - User-Friendly Privacy Settings Interface
summary: As a retired social worker, I want a simple and intuitive privacy settings interface so that I can easily manage my personal and health information without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Guided Onboarding Process with Voice Assistance
summary: As a retired social worker, I want a simple guided onboarding process with voice assistance so that I can easily configure and start using ALFRED without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Health Monitoring Integration
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to integrate with my wearable health devices so that I can easily monitor my health conditions and receive timely reminders for medication and alerts during emergencies.

title: Voice-Driven Social Connectivity
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to easily use voice commands to send messages and make video calls to my family and friends, so that I can stay socially connected despite my limited mobility.

title: User Feedback Mechanism for Improved Communication
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to easily report issues and make suggestions regarding communication features so that I can enhance my ability to stay socially connected and manage my volunteering activities effectively.

title: Customizable Accessibility Profiles for Individual Needs
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to have a customizable accessibility profile so that I can tailor the ALFRED system to accommodate my reduced mobility and arthritis pain, ensuring I can easily manage my communication and scheduling tasks.
